Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: full-time \full-time\ adj. spending or requiring all of the time normally given to an activity; as, full-time students; a full-time job. Opposite of {part-time}. [WordNet 1.5]
full-time adj : for the entire time appropriate to an activity; "a full-time job" [ant: {part-time}] adv : for the standard number of hours; "she works full-time" [ant: {half-time}]
